'''0.24_SURVIVAL_TEST_03''' is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on September 1, 2009, at 17:55 UTC.<ref><samp>.jar</samp> dates to 19:55 UTC+2</ref><ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "''P1:22:12 <Marach> now it is _03 version!''" (18:22 UTC)</ref> This version is not available in the [[launcher]], but has been archived elsewhere.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Liquids no longer are dropped as items when blown up by [[creeper]]s.
* Players can no longer copy blocks into their hotbar.
* Fixed most other bugs from [[0.24 SURVIVAL TEST]].{{info needed|too vague - should be replaced with examples}}

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* Hitting a mob near a sign causes the text to turn white.<!-- (It may have something to do with the white flash that appears when attacking mobs and the sign also being an entity)-->{{cn}}
* Placing a sapling on sand makes the sapling disappear.

== Trivia ==
* This is the oldest archived version of the Survival Test.
